data.text: @estherlimtf I wouldn’t doubt it 😒… I’ve seen “paleness” and “change in gait” (the person walked differently) 😒😏🤦🏽‍♀️
@ObviouslyAlone Didn’t someone have the “deja vu” reaction on there? 🤦🏻‍♀️

@ObviouslyAlone There’s everything from nurse/Dr level mask correctors at @FixTheMask to simple ones w/3 large rubber bands you can Google. Ear pads, head bands, interior silicone type braces to put inside to give you more breathing room (& not mess up lipstick if you’re wearing any) at Amazon.
@ObviouslyAlone My doctor couldn’t wait to get this as he discovered he has a colleague who’s an anti-vaxxer & he knows I’m a warehouse of info.
@lovemoz1 That’s what I’ve been telling ppl… anyone can put anything… I’ve seen thee most ridiculous things on there 😒

@ObviouslyAlone VAERS is open to everyone. People have listed becoming the Green Hulk on it. This is a 44 minute point by point rebuttal of that Dr I won’t mention who’s the leader of the anti-vaxx movement. This guy destroys him. https://t.co/uTfSkMDlv3
@ObviouslyAlone They should read the side effects of their cigs, booze and supplements.
